title: @RiotRepertoir I want you to explain me one thing
body: To begin with, I am talking about Evelynn and I have one question that brothers me for a very long time. So, the thing, which I want to ask you is-why Evelynn's E has not been reverted to be magical since DFG is gone or the ultimate's biggest nerf (from max health to current health)? In my opinion at least one of them should have been brought back to her power. Sadly, Evelynn's player base have not been given an answer, even if we have made a lot of threads about this topic. I will be very grateful to see a response from you! :) {{champion:28}}

replies.body: Honestly, I may have just been oblivious to it, but I didn't think that having her E be magic damage was something Evelynn players really even cared about all that much. Out of curiosity, what do you see to be gained from having it be magic damage? Off the top of my head, I imagine it opens up penetration builds a lot more. Is there anything else? Do Eve players (or former Eve players) prefer the kinds of builds that having E as magic damage enabled?

It meant that AP Eve's burst was able to be itemized for with MPen, where as Physical damage it makes far more of her initial burst into damage which gets no bonus from Mpen.

Since past runes&masteries, Eve cannot itemize hybrid pen, making it magic damage would allow her to do so better.

This also wasn't a problem recently because of the conversion to magic damage that runeglaive used to give. Now the problem is back.

iirc there was a HUGE backlash when riot converted eve's E from mag to phys dmg. Her fan base was really pissed as it conpletely gutted eve's **assassin** build. I mean, it's not like an **assassin** build is all that important on an **assassin** themed champion or anything.
Sorry, I meant currently. I do remember the change at the time. I just didn't know it still resonated so strongly with Eve players. I should have been more specific.

yeah, that's okay. But I feel like current eve players are feeling like Cass players atm. They just kinda gave up voicing their opinion about anything simply because no one seems to care or is actually doing anything about it anymore.

I was never a hard core eve fan (despite her being the very first champ I ever bought in league), but I have kept up with most of the news and feels surrounding her over the years.

But yeah, personally, I really feel that both the Karma rework (\*sniff\* I really miss old karma) and the Cass (cass rework especially) and even to some really really minor extent the veigar rework has all left a really bad taste in my mouth. I really disliked how riot just pushed through with the cass changes despite such a huge outcry by the fans insisting that machinegun mage was not cass's identity and how we wanted a poison dot mage, only to be told that champs like "brand, mord, and malz were dot mages and how she'd be stepping on their toes." (fyi, only malz can be consisdered a dot mage, and his best use case is as a burst mage)
cassio players didnt gave up yet . {{champion:69}} {{summoner:30}}

I mained mid eve for a long ass time until y'all gutted her ult 3 different ways in one patch. Max hp---> Current, Big CD increase, and big range nerf. 
When you guys removed DFG, I hoped she was going to get buffed, but nothing. It makes me really, really sad because I hate playing her as this ad tank abomination that is the only way to play her now. She is a sneaky assassin, and yet your latest change to her pushed her even further away from that, toward a tank initiator even more. 
I feel betrayed, since the stealth rework that took almost 3 years was supposed to move her to a healthy stealth assassin play style. And even after that, you guys (not you personally, I know) still have just kind of shrugged after nerfing her to the point where she can't even be played as the character she was designed to be, and IS thematically. It feels like the message is "if there's someway to play her, that's fine" and for me, that really isn't cool. Sorry, that's just my rant, I've been holding it in for literally years now, and you seem like a Rioter that listens well, so there you go. XD
meanwhile lee sin can ward jump ... because community would back lash if they would make him unable to do it
Yet Braum can use a stylistically-similar ability but isn't allowed to ward hop

Yes, we do prefer E as magic damage. Although there's currently the possibility to build Evelynn as AD with armour pen, I think rather than a DPS build we'd all rather build a bursty AP build that kills enemies and then slinks back into the shadows.

YES. SO MUCH YES. While you're at it it'd be nice if you could make her ultimate less terribad. It doesn't even have base damage to execute. With dfg gone there's no reason it shouldn't be max % hp.

E dealing physical damages, gutted her scaling, as she can't get voidstaff any longer, it also means the snowbally sorcshoes+haunting guise build did't work.

Right now Eve is a mess to build offensively, as she deals lots of mixed damage, and have wacky skills damage type-wise. It's of a reason she often end up as some sort of bruiser/tank flanking initiator in comp.

Well, you thought of it right. Most of the majority prefers building magic penetrations to tanky. I mean, nowadays, thanks to runeglaive, Evelynn AP is much more played and penetration is needed. Yes, you can lower its damage, but make it magic. There is nothing that stops you from doing it. Finally, thank you for responding! :) {{champion:28}}

Just leave Eve alone, thanks. If you change her E it will break her and you will have to nerf her again (just like you guys did when Runeglaive came out).

No thanks. Just leave her alone.

As a side-note, if you want to increase the amount of magic damage you do (making pen more effective) you can build a Nashor's Tooth like I do, since her E applies it twice. If you changed E back to magic you would likely have to remove the on-hit part of the skill and change it back to a "spell effect", which would make nashors useless on her and also make it harder to proc spellblade (which is now conveniently mandatory if you go AP, since it is part of your jungle item). It would also ruin a lot of current AD Eve builds (which rely on on-hits such as bork and still usually include a sheen item such as triforce or IBG). Liandrys/Rylais/tank is a common build right now, and this is probably the build that would cause her to get nerfed if E was magic again (so people who think it would make assassin Eve stronger are wrong; it would make assassin Eve pretty strong, for a patch, but then rylais/liandrys/tank Eve would cause Eve to get nerfed the next patch, making assassin Eve weaker at that point than she is right now as of 5.15).

tl;dr leave her alone, she's fine, and I don't want her to be "buffed" only to have her nerfed even harder the patch afterwards. Assassin Eve works right now, you just have to build properly and sacrifice a couple utility items if you want your damage. Don't punish the people who make assassin Eve work right now by actually thinking through their builds just because SOME people lack the capacity to come up with viable builds with her current kit.

While mixed damage precludes building penetration, it does make your champion harder to itemize against. So I don't think that it would necessarily be a complete buff to revert that change. I remember during the most recent Sion nerf it essentially said that during the laning phase Sion hurts no matter what you rush against him. Build armor? W and E do magic damage. Build magic resist? Q and R do physical damage. Health? W does percent health damage.

Not an Eve player, but I will comment that Eve players have been complaining about that nerf since it went live. I also don't think anyone is satisfied playing AD Evelynn, on-hit Evelynn, or tank Evelynn. She's tagged as an assassin for a reason, and AP assassins are more healthy and effective than AD assassins (as Riot stated for their reasoning behind why Ekko was AP instead of AD)

Her current E is fine, it's good if you go AD/on hit and less good if you go AP(I don't think ad/on hit is that great tho).
If she were to get a buff I'd rather have them be via items(my build is getting nerfed next patch 0_0 ).
